parameters.name: AllowCancel
parameters.description: Specifies whether the task can be canceled.

parameters.name: AllowChange
parameters.description: Specifies whether the time can be changed. Valid values: -**0**: The time cannot be changed. **1**: The time can be changed.

parameters.name: DbType
parameters.description: The type of the database engine.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return per page. Valid values: **30, 50, and 100**. Default value: **30**.

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description: Specifies the status of the task. Valid values: **0**: The task is waiting to be run. **1**: The task is running. **2**: The task is run. **3**: The task failed to be run.
